title: Beaches and boats
creator_credit: Leith Goodall, Norman A. Uren and Western Australian Government Film Unit
brief_description: This film depicts the beauty of Western Australia’s beaches and the lifestyle that can be enjoyed there. Sandy beaches stretch along the West Australian coast for hundreds of miles, providing an ideal place for a holiday of boating, water-skiing, surfboard riding, and sunbathing.
creator_credit_for_label: Leith Goodall, Norman A. Uren and Western Australian Government Film Unit
